name: Russian Police Traffic Pursuit 3D
description:
Like the Russian UAZ? Do you like police chase of traffic and crowds? Then this is your game!

HOW TO PLAY:
Circle the traffic and chase! But look to the suspect disappeared! Time counts!

Feel driver police UAZ in a new 3D game. Use your reaction and coordination, and grab the enemy! Successful chase!

Main Features:
- Amazing 3D graphics and full detailing police UAZ
- Intuitive controls
- Realistic physics police UAZ
- User-friendly interface
- Interesting mission

Want to feel like a cop? Sit in a police UAZ and chase a suspect! Forward in pursuit!
